name: 0d05b91e-7713-51ea-96a4-99f727c41e06
notes: This dataset contains temperature data acquired between April 2015 and September 2016 using16 thermocrons i-buttons © installed along chains in the field of view of the SMOOVE camera connected the SeaMoN East frame. Data was acquired every 2 hours. The array is not connected to an energy node. They are associated with the SMOOVE camera which is part of the SeaMoN East ecological monitoring node.
title: Autonomous ibuttons temperature data from the EMSO-Azores observatory, 2015-2016
